to get all the headers for some fub:
fubs_info -fval block=ddrdmvrfdrvdacana -headers all
To see if the fub is fev bb:
fubs_info -fval block=ddrdmvrfdrvdacana -headers fev_bb
set fubs_info -fval block=ddrdmvrfclkgenana -headers aip_rtl_name

fubs_info -p skluncore -fval additional_type=aip,allowed_fubs=%ddrdata% -headers block,librar
all aips:
fubs_info -headers block -fval additional_type=aip,aip_origin=bdw

# to get all the cells with all the headers
fubs_info -p sklip -headers block,cluster,unit,section,ip_category,status,supply_compliance,halo_required,library,type,allowed_fubs,parent,aip_name_hsw,module,aip_origin,aip_rtl_name,rtl_owner,fev_bb,pv_bb,mutation_prefix,design_style,ckt_owner,design_type,lay_owner,top_ip,scan,additional_type,circuit_owner,layout_contact,circuit_contact,fev_box_type,pv_type,shared_by,aip_ce,prop,last_milestone,num_of_instances

# getting info for one particular block only (pllmca in this case).
 fubs_info -p sklip -headers block,library,ckt_owner -fval block=pllmca
